briefdescription.para: Deselects all axes by setting each axis to false.
Disables Normal Mapping FX Mode by setting fNormFXMode to false. UNUSED - TODO REMOVE ME!
Disables copying tags by setting fCopyTags to false.
Sets preserve workspace flag to false, delete memory after execution.
Enables Normalized FX Mode by setting fNormFXMode to true. UNUSED - TODO REMOVE ME!
Sets a flag to preserve workspace memory after execution.
Selects all axes for transformation. sometimes we may want to select/deselect particular dimensions of the x-form default is to transform along every dimension, but that may not always be needed.
Selects an axis for transformation if its index is within the array rank.

parameterdescription.para: Index of the axis to select.

briefdescription.para: Setter for end padded, zero padding from end of data out to end of the array.
Setter for padded size, instead of a multiplicative factor, the original array, length N is padded out ot the new specified length M.

parameterdescription.para: New padded size of type std::size_t

briefdescription.para: Setter for padding factor, the factor M by which the new array will be extended (original array, length N, new array length NM)

parameterdescription.para: New length factor for extended array

briefdescription.para: Setter for reverse end padded, place data at end of array and zero pad out to start.
Executes operation in-place by copying temporary workspace back to input object.

parameterdescription.para: Input object of type XArgType* that will be modified in-place.

simplesect.para: Boolean status indicating success or failure of the operation.

briefdescription.para: Initializes in-place by creating a temporary workspace and calling InitializeOutOfPlace.
Initializes out-of-place processing for input and output arrays.

parameterdescription.para: Pointer to constant input array of type XArgType
Pointer to output array of type XArgType

memberdef.definition: std::enable_if< !std::is_base_of< MHO_TableContainerBase, XCheckType >::value, void >::type hops::MHO_EndZeroPadder< XArgType >::IfTableTransformAxis
memberdef.name: IfTableTransformAxis

briefdescription.para: Applies transformations to all axes of an input XArgType table and copies tags.

memberdef.definition: std::enable_if< std::is_base_of< MHO_TableContainerBase, XCheckType >::value, void >::type hops::MHO_EndZeroPadder< XArgType >::IfTableTransformAxis
memberdef.name: IfTableTransformAxis

detaileddescription.para: Pads out the end of a multidimensional array with zeros.
